item.title: Dutch Housing Situation - Rotterdam
item.description: Loading Libraries Data Wrangling House Prices over time - Netherlands Netherlands Rotterdam Rotterdam Vs. Netherlands As a Data Science Trainee for the municipality of Rotterdam, I was tasked to find out-of-the-box data sources to measure economic growth within the city. Naturally, I turned towards online estate agents. Funda and Jaap.nl are the biggest players in the Netherlands. Fortunately for me, Jaap.nl makes aggregated data for each municipality publicly available.
